news.title: News one
news.note:
f you make POST, PUT, PATCH or DELETE requests, changes will be automatically and safely saved to db.json using lowdb. Your request body JSON should be object enclosed, just like the GET output. (for example {"name": "Foobar"})
Id values are not mutable. Any id value in the body of your PUT or PATCH request will be ignored. Only a value set in a POST request will be respected, but only if not already taken.
